template.query:
SELECT * FROM vendors
WHERE enabled = true
template.transformer:
// Query results are available as the `data` variable
return data

template.changeset: [{"key":"vendor_id","value":"{{ new_vendor.value }}"},{"key":"ordered_date","value":"{{ new Date() }}"},{"key":"expected_date","value":"{{ new_expeceted_date.value }}"},{"key":"status","value":"'Open'"},{"key":"ordered_items","value":"{{ new_order_item_details.data.length }}"},{"key":"total_price","value":"{{ new_order_total_price.value }}"},{"key":"reference_code","value":"{{ new_reference_code.value }}"}]

template.transformer:
// Query results are available as the `data` variable
return data

template.changeset: [{"key":"status","value":"{{ update_status.value }}"},{"key":"received_date","value":"{{ update_status.value == 'Finished' ? update_received_date.value || null : null }}"},{"key":"reference_code","value":"{{ update_reference_code.value }}"},{"key":"po_notes","value":"{{ update_po_notes.value }}"}]
template.transformer:
// Query results are available as the `data` variable
return data

template.query:
SELECT items.name, items.default_cost, items.id as item_id, items.qty as item_qty, 
purchage_order_details.id as order_detail_id, purchage_order_details.ordered_qty, purchage_order_details.received_qty, purchage_order_details.status FROM purchage_order_details
  LEFT JOIN items ON items.id = purchage_order_details.item_id
WHERE purchage_order_id = {{ tb_orders.selectedRow.id }}
template.transformer:
// Query results are available as the `data` variable
return data

// Query results are available as the `data` variable
return data
